name: Despacito 2: The Worst Game Ever Created
name_original: Despacito 2: The Worst Game Ever Created
description:
In what i guess was 2017 or something around this i came to a video game learning class from ubisoft where they basically told me to put a few assets everywhere the whole thing is unplayable and really shitty (super broken too) but i felt like i should give it to the world for those who are curious about the asbolute shitty mess this game is  (My mother stopped paying funds to send me to ''video game school'' and i never got further than this)



as much as i hate to admit it im kind attached to this game it certainly has a lots of my old humour and dare i say some of my personality in it ?


it controls like pure shit:

WASD to move

buttons on keyboard to attack

hold right mouse to move camera

if ur too slow i made strafing faster 


MUSIC USED :

pilotedsun - Greetings (Menu)

pilotedsun (back when he was known as bittertooth) - One Universe Away
